text: Paulo Costanzo (born September 21, 1978) is a Canadian actor. He is best known for his roles as Rubin Carver in the comedy movie Road Trip (2000), Joey Tribbiani's cousin Michael in the NBC sitcom Joey and as Evan R. Lawson in the USA Network drama series Royal Pains. Costanzo was born in Brampton, Ontario. He is of Italian and Jewish ancestry. He is color blind. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Ontario Category:Canadian Jews Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Jewish actors Category:People from Brampton, Ontario
title: Paulo Costanzo
